task_summary: Detect and grasp the dishwasher handle, then pull to open the hinged dishwasher door and safely retreat.

task_long_description.overview: A mobile manipulator approaches a kitchen dishwasher. The goal is to pull open the dishwasher door by grasping its bar handle. The robot must first perceive the handle, align its end-effector, and grasp with a pull-oriented strategy. After establishing a stable grasp, it actuates an opening by pulling the hinged door downward/outward until clearly open, then releases and retreats. Constraints include precise alignment on a reflective stainless surface and avoiding collisions with nearby appliances and cabinetry.
preconditions: Sufficient clearance in front of the door
stepwise_plan: Perceive and localize the dishwasher handle.
Open gripper and compute a pull-oriented grasp.
Approach and align to the handle; set yaw to match bar orientation.
Trigger container opening for the hinged dishwasher door (pull action).
Retreat, release the handle, and back off to a safe distance.
success_criteria: Door angle increases and remains open
failure_and_recovery: Handle not detected → perform another perception pass or small viewpoint change
Misalignment → re-approach and realign then retry grasp
Grasp slip → reopen gripper, recompute grasp, retry
Door stuck → increase pull duration (longer timeout) and retry
task_long_description.termination: Terminate when the dishwasher door is open and the robot has released the handle and retreated to a safe standoff.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

node_specs.description: Move to pregrasp and align precisely.
Rotate gripper to match bar handle orientation.
Execute the grasp on the handle.
Pull to open the dishwasher door.
Back away to clear the opening.

recovery_strategy: Repeat detection and small viewpoint change
Realign with smaller tolerance then retry pick
Extend opening timeout and pull again
assumptions: Frames show a hinged dishwasher door opening downward/outward; mapped to container_type 'hinged_door'. If it were a sliding drawer, container_type would differ.
No people or occlusions affecting the task.

expected_success_criteria: Door angle clearly increases across frames 5–8
